start.text: Everyone have to come back alive this time as well.
Don't make the mistakes I've summarized last time, Commander-San.

start_boss.text: In situation like this, we can't be as careless as before.
This time I'll have to be more serious...
Though the predicted result is not optimistic, this is precisely the time to keep your spirit up.
Commander-San, please be more careful than usual!
I hope these kind of practical experience are less common.

retreat.text: Commander-San, I'll reward you if you come back safely, so please hurry!

out_of_missiles.text: Missile empty, it will be a grind now.

engaged.text: This time I won't be brashed aside like before...
Don't judge me by my looks, I'm pretty good with fighting.

need_help.text: Commander-San, the situation is urgent in my area!
Hold on everyone, I've requested support.
This sector is under presssure, I request support.

pursuing.text: Yes, We are pursuing with advantage...
Everyone's condition is great, we are going to pursue now.
Engine output steady, we will pursue.

running.text: It's fine, I'm flexible amount these kind of things.
Ah, please don't stare at me for now, commander-san...
Looks like the enemy seized some opportunites.

hull_90.text: Damage within controllable range, don't worry, commander-san.
Be careful everyone, the fight will get more intense.
Umu, I should be more careful...
Damage control team should get online.

hull_50.text: So far within the text books.
Man your positions, we still have a chance.
Analysis show our chance of surival has greatly reduced, commander-san
I think I've remebered something terrifying...

hull_30.text: Can we ensure evacation of the wounded?
Ignore analysis and data, the key is to ensure survival now.
It really is hopeless, is it?

overload.text: Energy system warning, are the damage control team in posistion?
Damn, this is the kind of situation I hate the most...
Everyone brace for impact, we may recieve a high intensity strike.
It really is much more powerful than simulations...

victory.text: Battle is over, I will now take care of the wounded.
It finished pretty smoothly this time as well.
Since commander-san have worked hard, want to touch my wings?
Its great that everyone is allright...
